mapper.select: /* 추천 일련번호 생성 */ SELECT MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pst_intract_sn, '_', -1) AS UNSIGNED)) FROM post_interactions pi WHERE pi.pst_intract_sn REGEXP '^pst_itrct_[0-9]+$';
mapper.insert: /* 추천수 증가 */ INSERT INTO post_interactions (pst_intract_sn, pst_sn, user_no, intract_type_cd, crt_dt, rtrcn_dt) VALUES (#{pstIntractSn}, #{pstSn}, #{userNo}, 'like', Now(), null);
mapper.update: /* 게시글 조회수 증가 */ UPDATE posts p SET p.view_cnt = p.view_cnt + 1 WHERE p.pst_sn = #{pstSn};
mapper.select: /* 특정 게시글 상세 조회 */ SELECT p.pst_sn, p.bbs_clsf_cd, p.wrtr_user_no, u.user_ncnm, p.pst_ttl, p.pst_cn, p.view_cnt, p.ntc_pst_yn, p.crt_dt, p.mdfcn_dt, p.del_dt, (SELECT COUNT(pc.pst_cmnt_sn) FROM post_comments pc WHERE pc.pst_sn = p.pst_sn And pc.del_dt IS null) AS cmnt_cnt, (SELECT COUNT(pi.pst_intract_sn) FROM post_interactions pi WHERE pi.pst_sn = p.pst_sn AND pi.intract_type_cd = 'LIKE' AND pi.rtrcn_dt IS NULL) AS inter_cnt FROM posts p LEFT JOIN users u ON p.wrtr_user_no = u.user_no WHERE p.pst_sn = #{pstSn};

/* 특정 게시글의 댓글 목록 조회 */ SELECT pc.pst_cmnt_sn, pc.pst_sn, pc.wrtr_user_no, u.user_ncnm, pc.cmnt_cn, pc.crt_dt FROM post_comments pc LEFT JOIN users u ON pc.wrtr_user_no = u.user_no WHERE pc.pst_sn = #{pstSn} AND pc.del_dt IS null;
/* 게시글 일련번호 생성 */ SELECT MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pst_sn, '_', -1) AS UNSIGNED)) FROM posts p WHERE p.pst_sn REGEXP '^post_[0-9]+$';
mapper.insert: /* 게시글 등록 */ INSERT INTO posts (pst_sn, bbs_clsf_cd, wrtr_user_no, pst_ttl, pst_cn, view_cnt, ntc_pst_yn, crt_dt, mdfcn_dt, del_dt) VALUES (#{pstSn}, #{bbsClsfCd}, #{wrtrUserNo}, #{pstTtl}, #{pstCn}, 0, 0, Now(), null, null);
mapper.select: /* 댓글 일련번호 생성 */ SELECT MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(pst_cmnt_sn, '_', -1) AS UNSIGNED)) FROM post_comments pc WHERE pc.pst_cmnt_sn REGEXP '^cmnt_[0-9]+$';
mapper.insert: /* 댓글 등록 */ INSERT INTO post_comments (pst_cmnt_sn, pst_sn, wrtr_user_no, prnt_cmnt_sn, cmnt_cn, crt_dt, mdfcn_dt, del_dt, del_user_no) VALUES (#{pstCmntSn}, #{pstSn}, #{wrtrUserNo}, null, #{cmntCn}, Now(), null, null, null);
mapper.update: /* 게시글 수정 */ UPDATE posts p SET p.bbs_clsf_cd = #{bbsClsfCd}, p.pst_ttl = #{pstTtl}, p.pst_cn = #{pstCn}, p.mdfcn_dt = Now() WHERE p.pst_sn = #{pstSn};
/* 특정 게시글 삭제 */ UPDATE posts p SET p.del_dt = Now() WHERE p.pst_sn = TRIM(#{pstSn});
